## MetricsManager.getAbsoluteMetrics() method

Gets the absolute left and absolute top in pixel coordinates. This is where the visible workspace starts in relation to the SVG container.  The absolute metrics for the workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAbsoluteMetrics(): AbsoluteMetrics;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

AbsoluteMetrics
